siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

node.excerpt: Stan with Milkshake Poptarts Dear Listener, Stan got a milkshake from Red Robin this week. It went about how you’d expect it to go. We also hit on some other things around Red Robin. We also discovered that there is a Strawberry Milkshake flavored Pop-Tart. Stay tuned for reviews…

frontmatter.title: Episode 26 - Starting 2019 and Looking Back on 2018
